title: Securities Collateral Distribution
description: Securities collateral distribution item extending base with quantity information

distributionCommandNumber.description: Number assigned by the Central Depository for each type of collateral

collateralIdentification.description: Collateral identification as known by party. Its identification is generated by the requesting party

assetNumber.description: Identifies the register number of the collateral deposit assigned by the central counterparty.

quantity.description: Quantity requested to the distribution with command.
